name: Duckmention
description:
Do you want to play a game with cute DUCKS?

Do you want to play a game with COOKIES?

Do you want toplay a game with SECRETS?

Well my friend, i think you got to the rigth place!

Duckmention (Duck and Dimension Combined) is a game about cute little Duckie who want to get it's cookie, using its power it change dimensions, while making precise jumps, and timing dimension change!

Controls:

Mobile/Controller:

Dpad - Directions

A - Jump

B - Dimension Change

Keyboard:

WASD - Directions

Space - Jump

Control - Dimension Change

P.S. The game is in VERY early state, but i guess it is playable, give your feedback, im always lisening!
